entry.title: ESDD4 (lavender fairy)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Decor Dolls
Price: 12.00

This sweet and whimsical Waldorf inspired Lavender felted fairy is handcrafted with 100% wool and pipe cleaner wire to hold the flowers. She soft, sweet and brings joy. Makes a lovely decoration on the window, bookshelves or nature table! Prefect for gift for all ages. 

size: 8" ht.
composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material. 
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover. 
Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.


Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.

entry.title: VP10 (ranuja pillow doll)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Decor Dolls
Price: 7.50

You will love this whimsical velvet Ranuja pillow doll. She so soft, sweet and happy. She will bring joy and smile anytime and anywhere. This will make a lovely gift for all ages.

size: 10" w x 12" ht.
composition: Handmade out of 90% velvet 10% cotton.
care: Hand wash in tepid water with mild detergents. Lay flat to dry.



Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.

entry.title: KD01 (woven happy & sad doll)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Decor Dolls
Price: 8.00

You will love this whimsical felted Happy and Sad Doll. This 2 in 1 doll is so playful, sweet, will bring joy and smile anytime and anywhere. This will make a lovely gift for all ages. Handmade out of 100% wool, using only soap and warm water.

composition: 100% Woven Cotten. Azo free dye.
care: Hand wash in tepid water with mild detergents. Lay flat to dry.



Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.
